items.instruction: Provision Microsoft Business Standard licence from CSP portal
Add user to the requested distribution groups
Add user to the correct signature distribution group on O365 based on location (Signature Location – replace Location with the user’s location i.e. Signature SG)
Send the member a Dropbox invitation from admin console
Add the user to the Dropbox group based on the user’s location
Send manager the login details for the user
PC Setup: Make Edge Chrome the default browser and Outlook the default mail app
PC Setup: Add the Salesforce extension
PC Setup: Set up MFA for the user
